text: Binɨb mapen yad okok. Nɨbop mɨj tɨkɨnɨg, God chɨnop tɨg asɨk dup takaw ak agɨnɨm agɨl gos nepin ak pen, mɨñɨl nepin, takaw olap sek mɨdeb nɨbop agɨnɨgebin. God binɨb ne mɨdobun okok, chɨnop takaw tep ne ak pɨsnep agñub. Pɨsnep agñub ak pen, binɨb ogɨnap takaw anɨb ak dɨl tɨg adɨkɨl, takaw adek ogɨnap ke agenɨgel, chɨn kɨlop nɨŋɨjsek lɨl agɨnɨgun.
